title: Why MVC is so important
content: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their own code between the Model layer for data, the View layer for design, and the Controller layer for application logic.

title: Programming Resources
content: W3schools.com is an excellent resource for getting acquinted with a programming language. They also provide a certification program to highlight on your portfolio.

title: Object-Relational Mapping
content: I have really loved learning about ORMs. It's really simplified the way I create queries in SQL!

title: Most popular technologies
content: Here is a link to the most popular technologies from StackOveflow. In 2023, they compared the popular technologies across three different groups: All respondents, Professional Developers, and those that are learning to code. It might be a long read, but a good one for insights. 'https://survey.stackoverflow.co/2023/#technology-most-popular-technologies'

title: Authentication vs. Authorization
content: There is a difference between authentication and authorization. Authentication means confirming your own identity, whereas authorization means being allowed access to the system.

title: ChatGPT and GitHub CoPilot
content: ChatGPT and GitHub CoPilot are by far the most indespensible tools for a programmer, they are your most trusty side-kick. They shorten development time significantly by providing examples that you can use and build upon.
